channel.title: NPR Topics: National
channel.description: NPR coverage of national news, U.S. politics, elections, business, arts, culture, health and science, and technology. Subscribe to the NPR Nation RSS feed.
channel.copyright: Copyright 2024 NPR - For Personal Use Only

item.title: A year after the DCA collision, families push for elusive changes to aviation safety
item.description: A year after the midair collision near Washington, D.C., families of the victims are pushing for action on aviation safety, including crash-avoidance technology. And they're digging in for a fight.
item.content:encoded: A year after the midair collision near Washington, D.C., families of the victims are pushing for action on aviation safety, including crash-avoidance technology. And they're digging in for a fight.
item.dc:creator: Joel Rose

item.title: A Minneapolis restaurant adjusts to the new normal
item.description: Restaurants in Minneapolis have shifted their business strategies -- and their missions -- around the federal immigration push in the Twin Cities region.
item.content:encoded: Restaurants in Minneapolis have shifted their business strategies -- and their missions -- around the federal immigration push in the Twin Cities region.
item.dc:creator: Juana Summers

item.title: New research examines long-term effects of federal housing program from the 1990s
item.description: New research looks at the long-term impact of a controversial federal program from the 1990s that demolished housing projects and replaced them with mixed-income developments.
item.content:encoded: New research looks at the long-term impact of a controversial federal program from the 1990s that demolished housing projects and replaced them with mixed-income developments.

item.title: Death of VA nurse Alex Pretti hovers over hearing on the Hill with VA secretary
item.description: VA secretary Doug Collins is appearing before senators to explain plans to overhaul the department. But some of the focus of the hearing was also on his comments about the killing of Alex Preeti.
item.content:encoded: VA secretary Doug Collins is appearing before senators to explain plans to overhaul the department. But some of the focus of the hearing was also on his comments about the killing of Alex Preeti.
item.dc:creator: Quil Lawrence

item.title: Minnesotans are training to become constitutional observers — of ICE
item.description: NPR's Juana Summers speaks with Edwin Torres DeSantiago, who conducts trainings for constitutional observation of immigration enforcement.
item.content:encoded: NPR's Juana Summers speaks with Edwin Torres DeSantiago, who conducts trainings for constitutional observation of immigration enforcement.
item.dc:creator: Juana Summers

item.title: Medicare Advantage insurers face new curbs on overcharges in Trump plan
item.description: Federal officials have a plan that could curb billions of dollars in overpayments to Medicare Advantage plans. But will they follow through on it?
item.content:encoded:
Federal officials have a plan that could curb billions of dollars in overpayments to Medicare Advantage plans. But will they follow through on it?

(Image credit: Anna Moneymaker)
item.dc:creator: Fred Schulte

item.title: Border czar says he plans to "draw down" ICE and CBP operations in Minnesota
item.description: Tom Homan, who took over leadership of the surge in Minneapolis, says he is working on a plan to reduce the force of federal agents in the Twin Cities.
item.content:encoded:
Tom Homan, who took over leadership of the surge in Minneapolis, says he is working on a plan to reduce the force of federal agents in the Twin Cities.

(Image credit: Scott Olson/Getty Images)
item.dc:creator: Sergio Martínez-Beltrán

item.title: DHS funding battle risks shutdown. And, Fed holds rates steady despite Trump pressure
item.description: Senate Democrats threaten a partial government shutdown over DHS funding. And, the Fed defies President Trump's pressure and holds rates steady to fight inflation.
item.content:encoded:
Senate Democrats threaten a partial government shutdown over DHS funding. And, the Fed defies President Trump's pressure and holds rates steady to fight inflation.

(Image credit: Chip Somodevilla)
item.dc:creator: Brittney Melton

item.title: Saying Minnesota has 'been through a lot,' Klobuchar announces bid for governor
item.description: Democratic Sen. Amy Klobuchar announced her run for Minnesota governor early Thursday. There is already a crowded field of Republicans in a race where immigration enforcement has become a key issue.
item.content:encoded:
Democratic Sen. Amy Klobuchar announced her run for Minnesota governor early Thursday. There is already a crowded field of Republicans in a race where immigration enforcement has become a key issue.

(Image credit: Anna Moneymaker)
item.dc:creator: Ellie Roth

item.title: At annual conference, Republican mayors call for de-escalation in Minnesota
item.description: At the annual U.S. Conference of Mayors, Republicans were among those expressing concern about ICE's tactics and calling for a de-escalation in Minnesota.
item.content:encoded: At the annual U.S. Conference of Mayors, Republicans were among those expressing concern about ICE's tactics and calling for a de-escalation in Minnesota.
item.dc:creator: Eve Zuckoff
